page.title: 10Employment In Banchory
page.content: WE SURVEYED 1147 PEOPLE EMPLOYED IN BANCHORY.WE FOUND THAT THE SERVICE SECTOR PROVIDED THE MOST JOBS WITH 58% WHILE THE INDUSTRIAL SECTOR PROVIDED ONLY 6%.THE PREVALENT EMPLOYER ARE THE GRAMPIAN REGIONAL COUNCIL EMPLOYING 185 PEOPLE.THE BIGGEST PLACE OF EMPLOYMENT IS THE GLEN O DEE HOSPITAL EMPLOYING 100 PEOPLE.21% of the survey work in shops it provides the greatest number of places of employment.144 work part time while 101 work full time There are a number of self-employed people predominant are builders and hairdressers.15% of the survey work in hotels and restaurants.Financial services dominant in the town with seven places of work.
